stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: IIR 6 015 6662 16/Unknown entities sought to compromise a Cleared Contractor's network using phishing and spearphishing emails as of 16 June 2016
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: EXECUTIVE SUMMARY. From 15-16 June 2016, a Portsmouth, VA based Cleared Contractor (CC) received multiple emails which contained a virus. These emails were identified by the CC's spam filter as coming from multiple different countries.
